name: BEST WESTERN Premier Hotel Dante

reviews.text: The hotel has a good location but thats about it for good points.
reviews.title: Not good

reviews.text: The room was tiny, and very dimply lit with just two tiny lamps. The window opened to a tiny little inside yard which got no sun, so there was no direct light at all coming in - rather depressing. The walls seemed to be paper thin, as I could clearly hear discussions and all other activites from other rooms, including when someone used the toilet or even switched their lights on. All rooms seemed to be also very close to the elevators, which add to the noise. Bathroom "window" opened to the dark elevator shaft!
reviews.title: Do not go to this hotel!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff was pretty friendly, and spoke passable english. This does not compensate for the shortages in the room. I cannot recommend this hotel as it is not even inexpensive.
reviews.title: 5 day break

reviews.text: Do not go to this hotel!!!
reviews.title: Great hotel close to local attractions

reviews.text: I booked by phone, to be sure I won’t get a little smelly room in the basement (I already experienced that in other cities..), I asked for a room at higher floor, and that is what I got - actually, the room was at fourth floor, it was small, and smelly, the window opened to a patio covered by a yellow glass three floors above – without any direct light. , bed was of poor quality. Room was also very loud, you could hear every word spoken both in corridor and in adjacent room. The window from the bathroom looked at the pipe tunnel. You need more?
reviews.title: On a loud main road

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for two nights while in Barcelona. We booked this hotel because a previous hotel we had reserved was so terrible that we refused to stay there for more than one night.
reviews.title: Very nice, reasonably priced

reviews.text: Staff were friendly and accommodating. Room was set up with a second internal door, which kept sounds from the hallway from entering the room.
reviews.title: Nice hotel
Dante Hotel
reviews.text: Compared to other hotels in Barcelona, this one was very reasonably priced. While not fancy, we felt it was worth the price.

description: The BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Dante has a privileged location in the heart of the city only three blocks from the emblematic Paseo de Gracia, walking distance to the Gaudi architecture, the modernist area and 10 minute walk from Catalunya Square. Whether traveling on business or pleasure the BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Dante is the best area to stay. For shopping, you are in the right place. You will find the most elegant and fashionable shops at the Paseo de Gracia and all kinds of restaurants within a radius of 100 meters. The BEST WESTERN PREMIER Hotel Dante offers a warm welcome and familiar atmosphere. Please note: As of November 1, 2012, a tourist tax will be applied in Catalonia: 1.25 EUR per person per night for stays between 1 and 7 nights. This tax will not be applied after the 7th night. The additional tax is not included in the rate booked and must be paid at the property. All children under 16 years of age are not subject to payment of the tax
